name: Project Portfolio
description: This static website is designed to display the owner's projects. A home page features a slider displaying project overviews. The projects page lists the owner's projects, and finally the about page tells the user about the owner.

stories.name: Owner Image, name, and tag line
stories.description: The site header should always display the owner's image, name, and tag line.
requirements: Left justify these in the header
Stack image over name over tag line

stories.name: Site navigation
stories.description: Pages include Home, Projects, About. Clicking on each navigates the user to that page
requirements: Navigation appears in the header, right justified
The currently active route is underlined
Routes in the url should be /, /projects, /about respectively

stories.name: Home page
stories.description: Consists of a slider with 9 images of various projects.
requirements: The currently active slide corresponds to the pagination below the slider
Slider automatically cycles through images on a 5 second interval
Clicking the right and left arrows as well as pagination navigates the slider

stories.name: Project page
requirements: Projects are displayed dynamically instead of hard coded
Display project image on the left, and project title and description stacked on the right

stories.name: About page
stories.description: Static text tells the user about the site owner.
requirements: Content should be long enough to cause the user to need to scroll in order to view all of it

stories.name: Mobile design
stories.description: Follows the pattern in the attached resources
requirements: Clicking on the menu icon opens the mobile menu navigation
Navigating or clicking the close icon closes the menu
The active route is blue instead of black
Header is sticky to the top of the page
